15 AI tools I (actually) use:

✦ chat.com for 'everything'.
✦ grok.com for viral tweets.
✦ opus.pro to edit any video.
✦ reddit.com for frustrations. 
✦ claude.ai to write anything.
✦ blink.new to copy websites.
✦ easygen.io for Linkedin data.
✦ canva.com to design images.
✦ perplexity.ai to ask questions.
✦ gamma.app for slides & decks.
✦ kinetix.tech for video animation.
✦ midjourney.com for artistic images.
✦ nano-Banana (gemini.google.com) to edit.
✦ veo 3 (gemini.google.com) for video generation.

What am I missing? Leave a comment & I'll test it.
